Would definitely book here again!

beautiful colonial home, very quaint and clean, convenient to the downtown area. very happy I chose this house.
This was a great place to stay. Very clean and spacious. Bree is a fantastic host!!!!!
We had a wonderful stay!
A whole house- four BDR, 1.5 baths- in a quiet Rutland neighborhood, minutes from route 4 and access to Pico/Killington. Lots of common space. Very pleasant stay. Would come back.
Great place to stay, it‚Äôs close to Killington and several other resorts. Close enough to walk to some nice restaurants and stores.
Very nice stay close to services! Vintage and warm and very pleasant place. For the price it's unbeatable!

Great house with plenty of room - really good location in Rutland and easy drive to Killington.
Bree was great - highly recommend!

Short drive to Killingotn and Pico mountains. Close drive to downtown restaurants. Great seating in the living room to relax after a day on the slopes. Washer and Dryer in basement a plus. Just enough amenities in the kitchen. Lack of dishwasher really not a big inconvenience. Bedrooms a good size.
Very easy and convenient if you‚Äôre looking for a place to crash next to Killington. Everything was good and owner was easy to reach.
Good location, easy checkin, smoothly experience.
Very nice property.
Nice place close to Killington. Worked well for a to a place to sleep and cook while skiing!

Bree's place was a great home base for our Killington ski trip! Bree made sure we had everything for our stay and was very responsive when we had questions. She was also very flexible with our reservation, as we had last minute additions to our ski group. The house has a ton of character and plenty of space/beds which was perfect for our group. We will definitely consider staying at Bree's place again the next time we are up to Vermont to ski.
great stay!
Great stay for a good value. Very walkable to downtown Rutland and restaurants. Only 20-25 minute drive to Killington mountain. House was well stocked, clean and comfortable.

This is our second time staying here, and once again, this place was perfect for a ski weekend. There are so many beds, and for the price, you can't beat it. I also noticed the updated stove in the kitchen, which was great.
Host was responsive and friendly l. Space was clean and as advertised. Overall very satisfied with our stay!
A great place to stay when visiting the Killington/Pico area
Had some minor issues but overall great stay. Highly recommend.
Stayed here while skiing at Killington. It is about 20-25 minutes away. Matched the photos of the listing. No issues.
Bree‚Äôs home was incredibly clean and felt right at home. It was the perfect spot to spend the evening after a long day of skiing!
Great home and Bree was an awesome host!

We spent our holiday break here as a family of 3 to enjoy the skiing. This lovely house is perfectly located for a 15 min drive to Pico and 23 min drive to Killington.
The house is super well equipped for our 10-day stay. We felt just like home with its peacefulness and convenience.
The host and her team were nice, responsive and reactive. We truly appreciate all their work and effort for our temporary home to be comfortable and memorable.
We really loved this experience at Bree's and can't wait to come back soon!
Awesome stay, large house with everything you need for a ski trip for a very good price, and accessible location to Killington.

This was the second year we have booked with Bree. We are a group of moms that like to get away and do some shopping in lake gorge. We don‚Äôt spend to much time at the house but it feels so welcoming when we get back at night. We will definitely be back next year.
Awesome experience. 10/10
Bree went out of her way to support us on a last minute decision to stay in rutland, thanks.
Really enjoyed our stay at Bree's place - everything was easy and smooth and the house was very clean.
Our brief stay at Bree's place was wonderful in every respect....it was comfortable, clean, and very roomy. Would love to visit again!
Just what we needed for a quick stay and everything was accurate. It was great location for us too
always a great stay
It was a perfect stay!
This spot was a great place to stay while we were in town for a wedding. Comfortable for three couples (at least!), we had privacy and plenty of public space to reconnect.
Big and spacious place with all the equipment for anyone planning a stay in Rutland.
Excellent place and Bree is very attentive and helpful. I recommend it
Nice and spacious. We were only there for a few hours, the place was very comfortable
Bree was a great host and responded quickly to our inquiries. The house was generously appointed with everything you could think of and more. Would have no concerns staying at any of her properties.
Good amount of space for a stay.
great house in the center of town

Very roomy old home. And not old in a bad way, old in a charming way. We felt right at home and made ourselves very comfortable. We were here over the 4th and actually got to see fireworks from the neighbors on the back patio. Obviously there was some late night noise from that but that is always to be expected in any neighborhood. We were maybe a 10-15 min walk to the downtown area, sidewalks the whole way. The Walmart in downtown is maybe a 3 min drive, but also included in that 10-15 min walk if you aren‚Äôt grabbing much.
Bree‚Äôs house was great, Bree was flexible with our check in. I would stay here again.

Plenty of room to stretch out. Great location, close to most everything. Bree was quick and easy to communicate with. Great value for the money. only issue ( not Bree's fault) was that alot of the places we wanted to visit were closed Sun and Mon but overall, the experience was awesome. Vermont is beautiful. Thank you Bree for sharing your place with us!

Nice place with communicative hosts! Easy in and out. The 4th bedroom is a little awkward to get in and out of but worked fine for us.
Just what my family needed!
Nice well maintained home well stocked. Very responsive to issue with internet.

A lovely little house a few blocks from downtown and next to everything in Rutland. Cozy bedrooms and lots of care in the house with historic touches. Loved the porch off the kitchen for outdoor eating. Bree was great and we‚Äôd definitely stay again.
Nice, older home. Steep stairs, but cozy bedrooms upstairs.
Very accommodating
Just an overnight stay, worked out fine. Thank you!
The place was perfect! Plenty of space and very clean. We will definitely be back!!

Bree's place was perfect for our spring skiing trip to Killington. The place was spotless and Bree even accommodated us an hour early for check in since we were ahead of schedule. We would absolutely stay with her again.
My family had a wonderful stay in Bree‚Äôs house. Would definitely recommend and stay there again!
House was clean and fully stocked with amenities close proximity to Killington and Stratton for skiing

Idyllic Vermont home at a great price. Cozy and homey building with lots of room for bigger groups. Convenient location for groups traveling to Killington or other Vermont ski areas. Everything was easy and seamless with checkin and stay. Highly recommend!

This was a perfect house. Eight friends and family could not have enjoyed it more. It was perfect for our long ski weekend . Warm and cozy. We spent lots of time in the spacious living room hanging out, watching the big tv and playing games. So much fun. Comfy beds. The location was great. Killington, Pico and Okemo close. Walked to restaurants and some fun stores.
We absolutely loved it. Thank you Bree and John.
great house.

We stayed for a weekend of riding at Killington, and the house was great. The rooms were spacious, kitchen well stocked, everything was clean, and the location couldn‚Äôt be better. We would definitely stay again!

Bree's place was perfect for our Pico/Killington trip. Great spot to access all Rutland has to offer while only 20 minutes or so from the resorts. House was super clean and cozy. Bree was very helpful as this was my first airbnb experience, hope to visit again.

We really enjoyed our stay. She had very good notes in a house book that covered most all questions we had. I had one question after checking in and she responded right away. We would not hesitate to stay there again if visiting Rutland, VT!
Homey and spacious - close to ski area
Was close to the venue..
Great place with easy access to ski resorts. Bree's place has everything we needed and was close to restaurants, grocery store, etc.
Bree was very accommodating and VERY fast regarding responding to any questions. Thank you Bree

Bree is very responsive and helpful. the house is old, but clean and warm with no problems. However, a few things to note when booking here: the house is listed as four bedrooms, but you have to go through one of the bedrooms to access the attic space. that means that if someone sleeps up there and needs to use the bathroom in the middle of the night, they have to go through someone else's room to get to it. that should probably be noted in the listing, since you pay for four bedrooms, but you may only really be able to use three. Also, Bree's house is just across the street from a gas station which is open late, so there can be traffic on the street late at night.
We were there for skiing. The house accommodated our family of five. We were satisfied with our stay except for the street noise.

Bree‚Äôs place was the perfect location for a winter vacation in Vermont. While my husband and son skied at nearby Killington and Pico Peak I toured the shops in historic downtown Rutland, a ten minute walk out the front door. We all made the journey through the beautiful Vermont countryside to Woodstock where I visited the many shops and they skied at Saskadena Six (formerly Suicide Six). Each day we returned to Bree‚Äôs home which was clean and comfortable and had everything we needed. Bree provided lots of information about local dining options and attractions and was accommodating about changing our day of arrival. I would recommend a stay here.

A great spot for a large group. So close to everything you need and a quick trip to Killington. The home felt spacious and comfortable, we felt right at home. It is stocked with some essentials in the kitchen as well as plenty of towels, blankets and pillows. We would absolutely stay again.

- Great place to stay if you're going to Killington for a short stay, especially for the value
- The beds are not the most comfortable
- The bedrooms also face an active road so passing cars may be an issue for noise
- There is only one shower so please consider that if you're booking with a larger group

Like others have reviewed before me, place is way better than pictures can show, huge house with tons of character, would like to have stayed longer & most certainly hope to soon return. Highly recommend.

Everything about this house was great. Bree was extremely responsive. We had a minor issue getting into the house one morning but reached (in the meantime I re read her instructions and found she left alternative instructions). The house was 20 min from killington and got out needs perfectly for what we needed.
Great Host

The house was better than expected.
Sparkling clean , lots to do around .
Comfy beds , and very easy check in .
We had a blast ,can‚Äôt wait to be back again .

Fourth bedroom is in an attic type space that can only be accessed through another of the bedrooms which was kind of an issue for us and could be for others as well. Bathroom on the first floor doesn't lock so just have to be good about knocking. 2 bathrooms but one shower - just something to be aware of. Overall felt clean and safe and we enjoyed our stay.
This is a great place, very close to ski resorts and had lots of options for dinning. We will definitely come back!
Fantastic value for a one night stay for five people. Not a single glitch in the whole process. The Christmas tree was a wonderful surprise. Thanks Bree!
Great location! Great price! Monopoly was fun so thanks for the games! All in all, a good time
Bree‚Äôs home was warm and comfortable after being outdoors all day watching ski racing.
Bree and her home were perfect for our quick getaway to Vermont & Okemo mountain. Would highly recommend this home to anyone! üòä

Place was perfect for 7 golfers!
Great location! Close to skiing, hiking and downtown Rutland. Nice, spacious, clean and well appointed. Flawless check-in. Definitely would stay again!
Beautiful house in a very convenient location! Thank you so much Bree!
One of the best places in Rutland, great value. Accurate listing
Great place to stay
Great place! Lots of rooms/beds and awesome kitchen and living room. Check in was seamless.
House is fantastic. Clean and cozy. During the winter it would be even better
Perfect location in Rutland, very close to shops, stores and easy to find. Parking for 2 cars in the back and extra parking on the street if needed.
Beautiful space in a great location, and Bree was a great host/communicator. Back patio was perfect for enjoying dinner too. We‚Äôd definitely stay again if we‚Äôre ever passing through the area.
This house is gorgeous, spacious, and very convenient location to Rutland. A great place to stay.
Really nice clean place convenient to downtown. Would definitely stay here again. Great value.
An extremely comfortable and homey space ... Bree was entirely hospitable, and when I became ill, she allowed us to cancel one night. We would certainly stay here again!
Very nice place! Quite spacious and well stocked!
Loved the house, and it was set up just right. Hope I can stay there again one day!
much better then pictures bedrooms big kitchen well equipt 1 1/2 bath and 1 full bath very close to everything very clean and has a great screened porch and a bbq

Thank you, Bree!

Love this spot!
Great for families or big ski trips. Ideal location in Rutland. Really can‚Äôt go wrong here.
A great find. Location is great, with nearby shops and restaurants within walking distance. The neighborhood is quiet and peaceful and the home was clean, comfortable and cozy.

Bree is a great host and communicates quickly. The house is clean, comfortable and lovely. Perfect as a hub for Mountain bikers in that there is quick access to the basement to store bikes and is a 3 minute pedal from Pine Hills park.
great stay!
Great value.
We had another nice stay at one of Bree's houses! There was lots of space and everything we needed was there. The screened porch was wonderful. We'll definitely rebook when we're back in the area.

This home is an absolute must-stay if you are visiting the Vermont area! It is in a quiet area and around a lot of cute shops and great restaurants. Everything and anything you would need, Bree has provided in the home and the home itself is beautiful and comfy! Cannot recommend it enough!
Great location, great home. Thanks
Across the street from a gas station and near to downtown. Very old house with lots of traditional charm.

Beautiful interior, lots of room, and very convenient to downtown. The keypad made check-in simple, off-street parking was a nice feature, and our hosts were very helpful when we had a question about the TV. Very clean and cozy! Enjoyed the screened-in porch in the evening and was thankful for the AC on the 90 degree days. Nearby convenience store was handy. We will be back!
Exactly as it shows!

Bree's home was a lovely place to stay in Rutland. It's just a quick walk to downtown restaurants and activities, and the home itself is spacious and comfortable. It was everything we needed - excellent value!

The house could accommodate several guests. It is located near the major stores and restaurants. We really appreciated the Keurig coffee maker and the k-cups. The house worked out great for our purpose of attending our daughter‚Äôs graduation at Castleton University . Thank you, Bree.

We‚Äôll be back!
Great place to stay. Would highly recommend this to anyone. Lots of room, very clean, warm and cozy, comfortable beds. Easy check in.
The home is in a very nice location especially if you are going skiing at Killington. It is a very cozy house that was great for our time in Vermont. I would highly recommend Bree to anyone!
In the location, it is great, very close to Downtown Rutland, easy drive to Okemo abt 30 minutes and to Killington about 25 minutes
The price was cheap and the house was great. Owner was super helpful and responsive. Would def stay here again!
Great house for a fun ski weekend with a big group! The house had tons of beds, a great living room for hanging out, and was close to Killington.
Awesome place for a ski vacation!
Nice place
Amazing find. The place was immaculate and warm, a must for frigid Vermont nights. I would highly recommend these accomodations.
Great location near Kilington. Walking distance to many restaurants and bars. Clean and quaint and perfect for a group to go skiing. Would rebook and definitely recommend!
Great stay!

Great value Airbnb. Clean house, easy to get in an out of, short drive to Killington, Keurig for morning coffee is a plus. Be aware that one room (with two twin sized beds) is in an attic that is attached to one of the bedrooms and is quite drafty in the winter.

This place had everything we needed and was in a great location. It was only 20 mins to Killington and had plenty of restaurants nearby. There was plenty of space at the place as well. Bree left a book of things to do and places to eat in the area that was very helpful as well.
Amazing place
Place had everything to make it a great place to stay.

This place is great. We used it as a ski pad (20 mins to Killington). Really nicely done, HUGE bedrooms, equipped kitchen, had some basics like spices, condiments. It's downtown Rutland so near EVERYTHING but quiet. All good!
Bree‚Äôs place was awesome for me and my friends. We had a great stay and would recommend her place.
Great stay! Lots of room
Good place to stay if visiting Rutland or vicinity. Had what we needed.
Clean, warm, comfortable!!! You can walk to town. The drive to the mountain is not bad at all!!!

We really enjoyed our stay at Home Sweet Home -- just the right location for our three hikes along the Appalachian Trail over a long weekend! You'll get comfortable. and it's accessible.
nice stay
Everything is green about this place.. we loved our stay!!
Great home for accommodating our guests visiting the area.
Good stay! No problems
A great stay.The house is well equipped with most everything needed. Convenient location..The large living room worked great for our family gatherings.

We really enjoyed our stay at Bree's place. House is set-up nicely, its clean, has a lot of home implements that makes your stay easier and lots of rooms to spread out. Its an older home with some quirky power arrangements but overall very nice and will have most everything you will need. Would happily return to Bree's place on any trip to Rutland, Vt.

Place was great. Coffee on the porch every morning was nice. Very clean house and well stocked. Bree was amazing allowing us to amend the reservation from 4 to 3 people at the last minute due to a family emergency.

Plenty of beds and space for the 4 of us. Just a short drive to downtown Rutland (also walkable). We enjoyed the farmer‚Äôs market on Saturday and found a fun coffee place (Speakeasy). Great hiking nearby and plenty of space for our son to explore.

Bree's house is excellent for many reasons. It is spacious and accommodating of larger groups, but it stays calm, homey and clean. Would recommend! Easy to find, the AC worked great, and very clean.

A clean home located near restaurants and stores. No handicap accessories but is well supplied with cooking utensils, coffee maker, toaster and a wonderful little crock pot. Toilets flushed well, water pressure okay and adequate hot water for showers.

Nice central location for the mountain biking in this corner of Vermont. The place was well-kept and as-advertised. Sitting on the back deck catching up with old friends was a treat. Already thinking of staying at this spot again for next year‚Äôs trip.
Nice older house in quiet area. Myself and my family enjoyed the home. Would definitely return

We would definitely stay here again!

What a lovely house! It was perfect for our family gathering of 5 adults- spacious, well equipped and so conveniently located. It reminded us all so much of the old New England houses we had grown up in- in the most charming way! Check in with the lockbox was super easy and Bree was quick to respond to questions. We‚Äôre sad we only got to spend one night here!
Big old house with many beds and gathering areas. Had everything we needed for an enjoyable weekend. Short distance from downtown Rutland. Would definitely stay again.
We had a fantastic time. Her home was wonderful. Every thoughtful convenience was there for us. The house is clean and comfortable. My family is still raving about it and was sad to leave.

This was exactly as advertised and had everything we needed. The location was perfect for us and the cost was very reasonable. Although we had no need for cooking, we appreciated that the kitchen had spices and would have been easy to use. The screened-in porch and back porch were perfect for enjoying our morning coffee. Check-in was easy!

This large house with its 4 bedrooms was terrific for our family congregating for family wedding events at the Killington Ski Resort an easy 20 minute drive away. Bree is a great host - responsive and friendly.
I was in town for a quick visit and had a great stay. It was a hot week and was worried about the AC keeping up, but the AC kept the place nice and cool my entire stay.
Excellent host! Always responded quickly with any questions! It definitely is a home away from home!

Very grateful that we were able to rent this house for the week. As others have commented, it was very clean and the beds were comfy. Nice towels. We slept well and were not bothered by street noise. Wifi was good. It is a normal city neighborhood and we never felt unsafe. It‚Äôs a good 1/2 mile to downtown; I walked twice downtown but not everyone would want to do a hike to dinner. We recommend Roots, the HopnMoose and Tokyo House. And Jones Donuts. Not to be missed.
Walkable to Pine Hill Park which has great hike and bike paths.
We cooked a number of meals during our stay and although the cookware was rather random, we always had a pan or pot or implement as needed.
Only negatives are that the shared driveway needs some attention (go over the sidewalk carefully), and that there is only one bath on second floor with the bedrooms (the half bath is off the kitchen). This was not a problem for us, but could be if all four bedrooms are being used.
Bree is very responsive and a good host. I will definitely stay here next time I am in Rutland.

Bree has a very sweet place. The two porches where great to just sit out and relax on in the evenings and the mornings with a cup of coffee or tea. Although we just stayed two nights She has everything that you might need for a longer stay. A great and comfortable house. It lived up to every expectation and we hope to stay there again.
All the basics, and more, are provided and there wasn‚Äôt a single ‚ÄúI wish it had...‚Äù on the entire stay.

We hope to return and stay there again in the future.
House is great. Neighborhood is interesting.

Perfect house for a vacation. The house felt so homely. The place was clean and accessible to most tourist areas.

Loved your place...........
This house was clean and comfortable.
This house is amazing and so is the Host. Bree is easy to communicate with, organized, and very quick to respond to emails.

As has been noted, very comfy beds and pillows. The 2 decks (one screened-in, one open) are awesome. TV and wifi were great. Cleanliness was great and I appreciated the day between guest stays. No dishwasher but did appreciate the washing machine and dryer.

Very cozy atmosphere and a great location. It has everything you need.
This is a great place. I loved staying here and was very easy to get to the ski mountains. Beds were comfortable and a very good setup!
Stayed with friends for a Killington ski trip. Description of listing is very accurate and Bree is very prompt in her responses. She embodies what a super host is supposed to be!
Very good value, simple & clean home with everything you need.

This is an place was a great place for us to stay. We used it for our ski trip to Killington and Okemo. The kitchen has all the amenities you will need to be able to cook most meals. If you not planning on stay here all day you will be fine with it.

Great place to stay close to ski resorts with everything we needed for our stay. Bree got back to us immediately with all of our concerns and took care of every issue promptly. Highly recommend and we will return.
The house was so nice and spacious, and it‚Äôs close to so many stores and places to eat!
Wonderful place close to Killington for a great price! Close to downtown too which is a plus.
The place was great. Close to Killington and Okemo. Everything we needed was driving distance. The house was super clean.
Great place, nice for after a day of skiing.
Great cozy stay, the house is beautiful and has that cabin feel. Bree is helpful and straightforward. awesome stay overall
A great place close to many neighboring ski mountains! It was such a great value and would totally stay again
Amazing place!
This house is close to Killington Ski Area, which is why we chose it. The area has lots of restaurants, food markets, and the house provided everything we needed and plenty of beds for our group.
Nice, homey place with comfortable beds
Spacious home in urban setting. Under 45 mins to scenic Woodstock and close to downtown Rutland.
The perfect place to come back to after a day of skiing!
Very clean

Plenty of hot water, convenient location, everything we needed for a great getaway. The house was within walking of downtown & Rutland is an easy start for anywhere in VT. As always, great stay at Bernie‚Äôs place! Loved the space. TV in each of the bedrooms was a nice add on. Have no complaints and will definitely stay again! üòäüòÅ
